product_description: Note: 1. You need to provide AAA*2 batteries to power the remote control. 2. The aircraft and remote control can only be controlled up and down, not left and right.If you mind the function please don't buy it. Functionality: Limited control: The remote control only allows the helicopter to rise and fall. There is no left and right direction control. Proximity sensor: There is a sensor on the bottom of the helicopter that detects the proximity to the surface and the ground, allowing it to take off and land automatically. Rechargeable battery: The toy includes a small rechargeable battery and a charging module. Switch: The helicopter takes about 3 seconds to turn on, no remote control is required. Positive: Flight stability: The helicopter flies quite well and is stable in the air. Automatic takeoff and landing: The proximity sensor helps take off and land. Rechargeable battery: No need to buy batteries frequently. Recommendations: Use in open space: It is recommended to use the helicopter in an open space without obstacles to avoid accidents. Adult supervision: It is important that adults supervise children when they play with the helicopter. Read instructions: Before using the toy, always read the instruction manual carefully.

name: RC ERA C127AI RC Helicopter for Adults, Black Hornet 4CH Brushless Motors Remote Control Helicopter, RTF Military Drone with 1080p Camera, Optical Flow & Altitude Hold
short_description: 🛩️【Realistic Military Scout Design】Inspired by tactical reconnaissance helicopters, the C127AI measures 8.45 inches long and replicates a modern military scout drone—perfect for collectors, display, or immersive flying missions.

🧠【AI Image Recognition & Tracking System】Equipped with intelligent AI vision, the helicopter can identify and track up to 80 targets (humans, vehicles, etc.), perform gesture simulations, auto-count targets, and lock on for tracking missions.

⚙️【Flybarless Brushless Power System】Featuring a single-rotor, no-aileron design with powerful brushless motors, the aircraft achieves high stability, wind resistance, and reliable performance—suitable for both indoor and outdoor flights.

📍【Altitude Hold & Optical Flow Positioning】With an integrated barometric altimeter and optical flow sensors, the C127AI maintains rock-steady hover and smooth positional accuracy, allowing stable operation for beginners and pros alike.

🎁【Perfect Gift for RC Fans & Tech Enthusiasts】Includes an ergonomic remote controller, modular smart battery, USB fast charger, and beginner-friendly controls like one-key takeoff/landing—making it an ideal high-tech gift.
